entry.value: # PARAMETERS%%00010# Geef het aan decimalen achter de komma aan, gebruik dezelfde eenheid als de projectie.%%00010# * RD New: in meters%%00010# * WGS84: in graden. In Nederland 1 m ~ 1e-5 graden%%00010decimals = 5%%00010%%00010# REDUCE PRECISION%%00010import pandas as pd%%00010import re%%00010%%00010# Convert to plain text, JSON actually%%00010input_json = input_table.to_json()%%00010%%00010# Match all numbers with more than `decimals` numbers behind the dot%%00010# Replace the match with the captured group, thereby removing abundant decimals%%00010output_json = re.sub(r'([0-9]+\.[0-9]{' + str(decimals) + r'})[0-9]+', r'\1', input_json)%%00010output_table = pd.read_json(output_json)
